long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Breaking the Bank is a captivating flash game that delivers an engaging mix of strategy and humor, appealing to gamers who enjoy a lighthearted and interactive challenge. The game revolves around the adventures of Henry Stickmin, a stick figure character with a penchant for getting into trouble. The primary goal of Breaking the Bank is simple yet thrilling: successfully break into a bank vault without getting caught.

At the core of its gameplay, Breaking the Bank features a series of choices that determine Henry's fate at each step of his heist. Players are presented with a variety of tools and tactics, from the absurdly impractical to the deceptively clever. Each decision leads to unique animations and outcomes, ranging from comical failures to successful breaches of the vault. This trial-and-error approach not only adds to the game's replay value but also injects a sense of suspense and unpredictability into the narrative.

If you have any questions about our Breaking the Bank Unblocked game extension or just want to give us some feedback, feel free to send us a message or write a review! We'd love to hear from you. You can mouse over to Support tab on the extension, then click on "visit the developer's support site" to contact us.

If you wish to remove this extension, follow this steps:
1. Click the 3-dot icon at the top-right corner of your screen.
2. Hover your mouse on More tools then click Extensions.
3. Find the Breaking the Bank Unblocked game extension.
4. Press "Remove"
